title: BV-BRC Workshop at Argonne National Laboratory, June 26-30, 2023
desc: The BV-BRC (Bacterial and Viral Bioinformatics Resource Center) team will be offering a Bioinformatics Workshop on June 26-30, 2023, at Argonne National Laboratory in the suburbs of Chicago, IL.

title: FULL: BV-BRC Workshop at the University of Virginia, April 25-27, 2023
desc: The BV-BRC (Bacterial and Viral Bioinformatics Resource Center) team will be offering a Bioinformatics Workshop on April 25-27, 2023, at the University of Virginia (UVA) in Charlottesville, VA.

title: BV-BRC Quick Start Guides
desc: Quick start guides and short video tutorials designed to orient new users as well as users from the legacy PATRIC, IRD and ViPR resources to the new BV-BRC Resource.
